pull.title: ui: Clarify help messages for 'message' fields
pull.body: Add or amend tooltips to clarify what the 'message' is for, and add a note that it isn't sent over the network.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Laanwj's Bitcoin Core fork - see README.md on "readme" branch

events.body: Ok, updated the messages, also updated a few others to make it clear that the fields are optional.

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/5514c7998a6ae6ba2ab614e130c93ddb7a216061 for binaries and test log.
This test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/current/
Contact BlueMatt on freenode if something looks broken.

events.message:
ui: Clarify help messages for 'message' fields

Add or amend tooltips to clarify what the message is for and that it
doesn't go over the network.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -153,6 +153,9 @@
     </item>
     <item row="3" column="1">
      <widget class="QLabel" name="messageTextLabel">
+      <property name="toolTip">
+       <string>A message that was attached to the Bitcoin URI which will be stored with the transaction for your reference. Note: This message is not sent over the network.</string>
comments.body:
Would it be more clear if you say:
`Note: This message was not sent through the bitcoin network.`

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -53,7 +53,7 @@
      <item row="6" column="2">
       <widget class="QLineEdit" name="reqMessage">
        <property name="toolTip">
-        <string>The message to attach to payment request</string>
+        <string>An optional message to attach to the payment request, which will be displayed when the request is opened. Note: The message is not sent with the payment over the network.</string>
comments.body:
And here:
`Note: This message will not be sent through the bitcoin network.`

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -153,6 +153,9 @@
     </item>
     <item row="3" column="1">
      <widget class="QLabel" name="messageTextLabel">
+      <property name="toolTip">
+       <string>A message that was attached to the Bitcoin URI which will be stored with the transaction for your reference. Note: This message is not sent over the network.</string>
comments.body:
This is still 'will be' as the payment has not been sent yet.
But apart from that, yes, seems a bit better.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -46,21 +46,21 @@
      <item row="4" column="2">
       <widget class="QLineEdit" name="reqLabel">
        <property name="toolTip">
-        <string>The label to associate with the new receiving address</string>
+        <string>An optional label to associate with the new receiving address</string>
        </property>
       </widget>
      </item>
      <item row="6" column="2">
       <widget class="QLineEdit" name="reqMessage">
        <property name="toolTip">
-        <string>The message to attach to payment request</string>
+        <string>An optional message to attach to the payment request, which will be displayed when the request is opened. Note: The message will not be sent with the payment over the Bitcoin network.</string>
        </property>
       </widget>
      </item>
      <item row="2" column="2">
       <widget class="QLabel" name="label_5">
        <property name="text">
-        <string>Use this form to request payments. All fields are optional.</string>
+        <string>Use this form to request payments. All fields are OPTIONAL.</string>
comments.body:
I would make it bold and use ! at the end. Uppercase seems like bad UX design to me, but that could only be a personal taste.
Perhaps even easier to use a new line and write:
`Hint: All fields are optional!`
